languages.text: {n}Еще раз окинув взглядом пустые покои, Соломон нехотя цедит:{/n} "Случается".
{n}Solomorne sweeps the empty chamber with his eyes once more and mutters reluctantly,{/n} "Sometimes."
languages.original_text: {n}Еще раз окинув взглядом пустые покои, Соломон нехотя цедит:{/n} "Случается".

traits.locale_text: {n}Staring at the smoking gun, Solomorne reluctantly grits out,{/n} "Sometimes."

languages.text: {n}« Ça m'arrive, »{/n} répond Solomorne à contrecœur en balayant du regard la pièce vide.
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sweeps the empty chamber with his eyes once more and mutters reluctantly,{/n} "Sometimes."

traits.locale_text: {n}« Ça m'arrive, »{/n} répond Solomorne à contrecœur en balayant du regard la pièce vide.

languages.text: {n}煙を上げる銃を見つめながら、ソロモーンはしぶしぶ歯の隙間から言葉を押し出した。{/n}「…時々」
languages.original_text: {n}Staring at the smoking gun, Solomorne reluctantly grits out,{/n} "Sometimes."

traits.locale_text: {n}煙を上げる銃を見つめながら、ソロモーンはしぶしぶ歯の隙間から言葉を押し出した。{/n}「…時々」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne recorre la cámara vacía con la mirada una última vez y masculla:{/n} «De vez en cuando».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sweeps the empty chamber with his eyes once more and mutters reluctantly,{/n} "Sometimes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne recorre la cámara vacía con la mirada una última vez y masculla:{/n} «De vez en cuando».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙再次扫视了一眼空荡荡的房间，不情愿地咕哝了一句。{/n}“偶尔吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sweeps the empty chamber with his eyes once more and mutters reluctantly,{/n} "Sometimes."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙再次扫视了一眼空荡荡的房间，不情愿地咕哝了一句。{/n}“偶尔吧。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, boş odayı gözleriyle bir kez daha süzüp isteksizce mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Bazen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sweeps the empty chamber with his eyes once more and mutters reluctantly,{/n} "Sometimes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, boş odayı gözleriyle bir kez daha süzüp isteksizce mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Bazen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lässt seine Augen noch einmal durch die leere Kammer schweifen und murmelt zögerlich:{/n} "Manchmal."
